text:
@atrupar @joncoopertweets @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Over past 2 months, the US should have built the testing, contact tracing, and quarantine infrastructure necessary to safely end lockdown and transition back to normalcy. Instead, Trump has substituted showmanship for action.
